title: Twitching Heart
description: The stories in Twitching Heart reveal the moments where lives shift and unravel, where they intersect and destinies chosen. From a husband hoping to save his marriage with the help of a mysterious faith healer to an airman’s first time at war, a widower’s deal with a rogue angel and a father’s perilous journey to reconnect with his daughter as the world around them crumbles, these stories show the American Southwest as rarely portrayed, as a changing landscape and cultural epicenter of our shared American future.
author: Matt Mendez
